summary.Title: Healthcare and Elderly Care Worker

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Healthcare and Elderly Care Worker

 

Location: Lolland, Denmark

Start: September 2025

Start of the Danish language course: May 2025

 

We are looking for skilled elderly care and healthcare professionals with the will and ability to relocate to Denmark, learn the Danish language and take on important and responsible tasks in our home care and care centre teams.

You will begin by joining a group of international newcomers and an extensive onboarding programme with Danish language course, relocation support and introductions to the workplace and to the local area.

 

Work tasks:

  • Your work will take place in a care center, or as home care in private homes (e.g. helping a person who just been discharged from a hospital).
  • Helping seniors with typical everyday challenges, such as taking care of personal hygiene, taking medicines, feeding.
  • Active participation in a Danish language course – both before coming to Denmark and on site.

Requirements:

  • Experience in elderly care.
  • Willingness to learn Danish (an online language course is provided: twice a week for twelve weeks from the end of May till the beginning of September).
  • Communicative English - min. B1.
  • Driving license (company car provided).
  • Qualifications in the field of senior care or a diploma of a Senior Caregiver will be an undoubted advantage.
  • You can show us your criminal record.

 

What we offer:

  • Employment based on a Danish employment contract.
  • Attractive salary from the first day of work - a very competitive offer on the European market.
  • A permanent job offer, with guaranteed vacation and holiday allowances, also for shift work or on weekends and holidays.
  • A unique opportunity for relocation - if you want to come with your partner or child - we will help you complete all formalities.
  • Support in the process of acclimatization in a new country, e.g. help in opening a bank account, applying for an insurance card.
  • Participation in a training project, thanks to which you will acquire comprehensive knowledge in the field of geriatric care: care for the elderly, care for a patient with dementia, first aid, activation of the elderly.
  • A Danish language course - free of charge.
  • Work giving a great satisfaction.

Occupation.Name: Social- og sundhedsassistent
AlternateNames: Social- og sundhedsassistent på et botilbud
Social- og sundhedsassistent inden for ældreplejen
